title: Household Debt-to-GDP Warning
description: A quick win: understand Household Debt-to-GDP Warning.

hook.text: Before every major property crash, household debt as a percentage of GDP spikes to dangerous levels.

buildup.text: When households borrow too much relative to the economy's size, the system becomes fragile.

discovery.text: U.S. household debt hit 100% of GDP in 2007. It had never been that high before in peacetime.

climax.text: High debt-to-GDP doesn't predict timing, but it predicts severity. The higher the debt, the harder the fall.
